details.title: AND Filter
details.description: Filter lists. Conditions are treated in an AND manner.

inputendpoint.name: condition-list
inputendpoint.label: Condition List
inputendpoint.description: List of conditions to be fulfilled by the values of the original list to pass the filter

outputendpoint.name: filtered-list
outputendpoint.label: Filtered List
outputendpoint.description: This endpoint provides a list with the values of "Original List" passing the conditions indicated by the "Condition List" endpoint
